review: Just what we needed! We were binge watching in no time! Our TV has a USB port but it doesn't have built in apps--thus, it's not the "smartest" TV. The Fire Stick was perfect for us because it allowed us access to tons of apps, excellent streaming, and made our TV a tad "smarter"! Set up was a breeze! I highly recommend!

review: So i get this about seven months ago and have loved it ever since. We have had zero issues with it working when it was supposed to. If you want the tech answer on this there are plenty of people that have that review. Here is my take on it. if you want to watch Netflix, amazon prime video and a few other online video formats then this is for you. Our old Bluray used to connect to the network and we could watch the online sources. after a few revisions it no longer connects and allows us to watch online sources. The Fire TV stick solved that in a very simple and easy to use format. You can get lots of apps to fit your needs and if you have a library on your network there are other programs that can be installed to reach formats that Amazon did not design. Do you research and you find that this thing it easy to use, simple for everyone to operate and if you have the additional need to do more it seems easy enough to find a solution for that too.
